Name: Landmarks, Claremont House: 1640 Anthony Avenue, Bronx (C 250220 HAX).
Title: Application number C 250220 HAX (Claremont House: 1640 Anthony Avenue) submitted by the Department of Housing Preservation and Development (HPD), pursuant to Article 16 of the General Municipal Law of New York State for the designation of an Urban Development Action Area and an Urban Development Action Area Project, and pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter for the disposition of such property to a developer to be selected by HPD, for property located at 1640 Anthony Avenue (Block 2888, Lot 23), Borough of the Bronx, Community District 4, Council District 15.
BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings and Dispositions

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Land Use
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings and Dispositions
